name: CardMunch, Inc.
description: Provider of mobile business card transcription services. The company's application helps customers to capture images of their business cards, as well as helps customers to capture images automatically, manage dual address books, and sync contacts.
one_liner: Provider of mobile business card transcription services. The company's application helps customers to capture images of their business cards, as well as helps customers to capture images automatically, manage dual address books, and sync contacts.
